CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( amc__Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Price") , amc__Cost_Budget__c - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c), IF( ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price + Expenses"), (amc__Cost_Budget__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Billable__c) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c) , (amc__Hours_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Billable__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the P&L for the Project based on the Actual figures. If Fixed Price, use the Project Budget, otherwise use the Completed Value Billable - Completed Value Cost + Actual Project Expenses + Mat Costs Completed
CustomField.label: P&L (Actual)
